name: Deltarune: Mike's Big Showdown
summary:
A Deltarune fangame surrounding the fan character Mike.
When Mike was created the community was split between him being a secret boss or the main antagonist of the game.
So I took all of those ideas and put them into this game. Here he plays the role of the main antagonist but turns into the secret boss. And in this fan game you fight him as the secret boss.
